summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingWave dry skin goodbye in just 2 steps with this Milky Moisture Duo from BYOMA that cleanses, hydrates, and soothes the skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsMilky Moisture Cleanser gently refreshes skin and brightens complexionHydrating Milky Toner soothes dry, dehydrated, and sensitive skinClinically proven to provide all-day hydration and protect skin barrierFeaturesDermatologist tested & approvedAlcohol and fragrance-freeRecyclable bottlesKey IngredientsMilky Moisture Cleanser (2.02 oz): Tri-Ceramide Complex supports skin barrier health - Oat Extract and Panthenol ease inflammation and hydrateHydrating Milky Toner (5.07 oz): Barrier Lipids help restore skin barrier and Polyglutamic Acid and Cica deeply hydrate and minimize TEWLItem 2635707How To UseFormulated with a host of hydrating heroes, including Oat Extract, Panthenol, and Barrier Lipids. These skin-saving ingredients work to lock in moisture across multiple layers of the skin, soothe inflammation, and nourish skin for a stronger skin barrier.Precautions: Eye irritation.IngredientsMilky Moisture Cleanser: Aqua, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Arachidyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Glucose, Glyceryl Stearate, Behenyl Alcohol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, Arachidyl Glucoside, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Germ Extract, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phytosphingosine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Stearic Acid, Oleic Acid, Maltodextrin, Cetyl Alcohol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Astaxanthin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Lactic Acid, Cyanocobalamin, Sodium Citrate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid.Hydrating Milky Toner: Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Polyglutamic Acid, Pullulan, Saccharide Isomerate, Xanthan Gum, Centella Asiatica Extract, Gluconolactone, Sphingolipids, Sodium Citrate, Beta-Glucan, Tocopherol, Ceramide NP, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-3, Methylglucose Distearate, Tromethamine, Symphytum Officinale Root Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Cetearyl Glucoside.
how_to_use: Formulated with a host of hydrating heroes, including Oat Extract, Panthenol, and Barrier Lipids. These skin-saving ingredients work to lock in moisture across multiple layers of the skin, soothe inflammation, and nourish skin for a stronger skin barrier.Precautions: Eye irritation.

reviews.headline: My new favorites
reviews.comments: I love both of these products and they've quickly become staples in my morning routine. The toner feels soothing and hydrating, without leaving behind a sticky residue. It leaves my face feeling soft and moisturized. The face wash does a great job of cleansing dirt, oils, and leftover makeup, but doesn't feel harsh or overly oil stripping. I have mildly dry skin and both products feel fantastic. I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: My skin is sooo soft
reviews.comments: I bought this duo hoping it would make my skin feel better, more hydrated and it did just that. Even if I don't wash with the face wash I still add some milky toner to my face and moisturizer and go about my day. In just a first few uses you can start to tell a difference.

reviews.headline: Is it worth it???
reviews.comments: Now I love BYOMA products and defenetly recommend this brand but maybe different products because I fell like there are lots of other products that are pretty much the same to this and I think are better, so don't waste your money on these. this review was written by Linden

reviews.headline: Fresh and clean
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] After giving these a try for 3 months I can say they've been added to my daily routine. My skin has been clear and clean! No breaking out, the toner helps remove leftover makeup when I use it with a cotton round. I don't like strong scents in my skincare so these are great. The packing is fun and cute!

reviews.headline: It's good
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a really good product. It takes us very smooth. Smells amazing. We need good packaging. I love the effort they made in putting in these packages together and it's very effective.

reviews.comments: Love the way it helps my face!ü•∞

reviews.headline: Good skincare duo!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Tried the BYOMA Milky Moisture Duo and really liked it. The toner feels creamy but light, absorbing quickly without greasiness. The cream is rich yet not heavy, perfect under makeup and gentle on my skin. Both are fragrance-free and great for sensitive skin. My face stayed hydrated all day. Packaging is a bit bulky, but overall it's an affordable, effective duo I'd recommend.

reviews.headline: I Lovve BOYOMA MILKY Moisture Hydrating DUO !
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I just love the BYOMA MILKY MOISTURE DUO! Some of the ingredients are found natural in your skim. The milky moisture face wash makes my skin feel so clean. The hydrating milky tone feels and smells so good. Leaving my face so soft and smooth. If you haven't tried it, you should!

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: I purchased this item on blind faith lol. I follow several influencers who recommended this milky toner (as well as another popular one). I love this!! It feels so good on my skin. I haven't been using this long so I haven't noticed any noticeable skin changes yet. Very light clean smell.

reviews.headline: Great value set
reviews.comments: I bought this as I'd been looking to try the Byoma Milky toner and I thought, why not, as I'd get to try the cleanser as well. Each item individually I have different opinions about but overall great ones, just some differences in preferences. I still think it's worth grabbing if you're looking to try both or restocking on your toner and looking to try the cleanser.

reviews.headline: BEST THING I've bought in a minute
reviews.comments: I see the hydration and the better protection of my skin after one week of use. I absolutely will not only buy this again but more products from byoma. It was my first time trying the brand after seeing a review about their good quality ingredients, amazing price and the cutest packaging.

reviews.headline: Skin looks Amazing now!
reviews.comments: I have been using these for about 3 months and I like it. I did finish the face wash which I really enjoyed. I play to repurchase it in the full size. it would leave my face feeling so soft and clean without feeling harsh. the toner is amazing!!! it leaves my face feeling hydrated and glowy without looking oily. my makeup has been looking amazing since I switched my skincare to byoma. Highly recommend

reviews.headline: Definitely will purchase again
reviews.comments: I received this product for free from Byoma in exchange for my honest review. I took this duo with me on vacation to Hawaii and was pleasantly surprised by how well it soothed my sun burnt/ salt water stressed skin. Its hydrating without leaving me feeling greasy or sticky.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was recently gifted the BYOMA Milky Cleanser and Toner duo in exchange for my honest review. 

I have never met a cleanser and toner I love so much! 

This set is best suited for for Oily, Dry & Normal skin type, but safe for all skin types.  
I lean into my Italian genes and have more oily to normal skin and this product is perfect for me

BYOMA cleanser is an oil-to-milk cleanser that EASILY melts away makeup and other skincare products leaving my skin feeling soft, smooth, super hydrated and with NO oily residue.  

It is formulated with a tricerimide complex to protect the skin barrier as well as morning seed, olive fruit oils and squalene to soothe, hydrate the and brighten the skin. 

BYOMA Toner is a milky toner containing Polyglutamic Acid and Cica that hydrates and calms.  Like the cleanser, it too contains a barrier lipid complex to reduce the appearance of dark spots & help skin look bright. 

BYOMA is Dermatologist tested and approved skin care.   It is 
alcohol-fee
fragrance-free
soap-free
vegan and cruelty free

This will definitely be a new staple in my skincare routine!
faceoff_positive.headline: 5/5‚≠êÔ∏è

faceoff_negative.comments: Okay so I received this duo which contains a milk cleanser which is the yellow tube and the toner. I haven't used it enough to see a difference in anything but it is good so I have extremely sensitive skin I break out with almost anything and these products have not caused any reaction whatsoever which is a plus. Also they are fragrance free no odor and if you catch a little scent it's the product itself kinda feels and smells like panoxyl the acne cleaner. The texture feels like water it doesn't emulsify it's not soapy it's basically milky like it says. And the toner it's clear white also like milk and water and it dries quick. I don't own the whole line so I can only comment on these and I like them so I will keep using them.
faceoff_negative.headline: BYOMA milk moisture due
